price: Kuma ku cika mũdu idan kun yi awo, kuma ku auna nauyi da sikẽli madaidaici. Wancan ne mafi alhẽri, kuma mafi kyau ga fassara.
arabic: وَأَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُواْ بِٱلۡقِسۡطَاسِ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمِۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-awfū al-kayla idhā kil'tum wazinū bil-qis'ṭāsi al-mus'taqīmi dhālika khayrun wa-aḥsanu tawīlan
